item.description:
It looks like we are going to have a nice bike ride.

I would suggest we meet on RT 138 Washington St and Main St. Right in front of North Easton Village Shoppers store.

Check the map
here

Helmets are must. This is going to be a combined bike on paved road and trail. There will be mud all over the place so be prepared. We are going to bike about 15 - 20 miles.


Weather update

http://www.weather.co...


Directions

From North

From RT 93 take exit 4 onto MA-24 S toward Brockton 9.9 mi
Take exit 17B to merge onto Belmont St/MA-123 W toward Easton 0.5 mi
Turn right at Stonehill St 0.7 mi
Continue onto Stonehouse Hill Rd 0.1 mi
Turn left at Main St
Destination will be on the right

From South

On I-95
Take exit 7A to merge onto Commercial St/MA-140 S toward Mansfield 1.0 mi
Turn left at Chauncy St 1.0 mi
Continue onto MA-106 E/Pratt St
Continue to follow MA-106 E 5.0 mi
Turn left at Depot St/MA-123 E 1.5 mi
Slight left at Center St 2.1 mi
Turn right at Main St
Destination will be on the left


If you need to talk to me call me at 617 640 1883
item.name: Borderland State Park - Social get together
